Sadelle's at Kith

Since opening its first location in the heart of SoHo in 2016, Sadelle's has become a staple New York City brunch institution thanks to its refined and celebratory atmosphere. Sadelle's features a menu of quintessential classics like bagels, sliced-to-order salmon, sandwiches, chopped salads, and other signature dishes, all served in a lofty, elevated setting.

Together with Major Food Group, Kith is proud to bring a taste of New York to our communities in Toronto, Miami and Paris, inside of our flagship stores at each location. As a modern ode to New York’s tradition of all-day dining, Sadelle’s at Kith offers classic Sadelle’s fare as well as location-exclusive menu items.
